text:
RELIGION

Selva Vinayagar Temple: Kaala Bhairavar puja, 5 p.m.; Karthigai puja, Railway Colony, 6.30 p.m.

Murugan Temple: Yagasala homam, 5.30 a.m.; pratishta puja, 7.15 a.m.; procession of diamond crown, 9.05 a.m.; deeparadhana, Tirumaliruncholai, 9.35 a.m.

Muneeswarar Temple: Masi festival; discourse on “Aandavanm Adiyargalum” by S. Sivasubramanian, Munsif Court Road, Tirumangalam, 8 p.m.

Ramakrishna Mutt: Discourse on ‘Aanmeega Vazhkkai’ by Swami Rajeshananda, 5.45 p.m.; aarathi, New Natham Road, 6.30 p.m.

Arsha Parampara: Discourse on ‘Lalithasahasranamam’ and spiritual heritage class by Swamini Vidyananda Saraswathi, Old Kalyana Mandapam, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 10 a.m.; on ‘Mundakopanishad,’ 7 a.m.; ‘Bhaja Govindanm,’ Vasudhara, Andalpuram, 6.30 p.m.

Sri Aurobindo Study Forum: Discourse on Sri Aurobindo’s ‘Life Divine’ by Subramany, Nithyatha, Auro Lab, Veerapanjan, 10 a.m.

Swami Tatwananda Ashram: Antaryogam, Swami Tatwananda Ashram, P and T Nagar, 9.30 a.m.

St. George’s Church: Interdenominational singing group presents J. Stainer’s Crucifixion , Main Guard Square, 6.30 p.m.

Sunday Vespers Service: S. Arjunan preaches, M. Andrew Pradeep leads, Jubilee Chapel, American College, 6 p.m.

Church of Christ: Sunday service; Deva Manickam delivers message, Gnanaolivupuram, 10 a.m. and 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Tiruvalluvar Kazhagam: P. Gomathinayagam Endowment lectures; R. Venkatasamy, former Superintending Engineer, Department of Agricultural Engineering, speaks on “Manam oru Marundu;’ S. Chandran of Thiagarajar College of Engineering on “Water Resources Management,” P. T. R. Kamalavijayarajan presides, North Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 6.30 p.m.

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre: Yoga and meditation classes; 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women).

Prajapita Brahmakumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Free rajayoga meditation classes; 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar; 40 Sambandamoorthy Street; 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

Universal Peace Sanctuary: Sundaramoorthi Sachidananda conducts free meditation class, 138 Kamarajar Road, 7 p.m.

Dhan Foundation: Heritage Walk, Yanaimalai, 6.30 a.m.; lecture on “Indian Culture Abroad: Emerson” by R. Venkatraman, historian, and V. Vedachalam, archaeologist, 1 A Vaidyanathapuram East, Kennet Cross Street, 5 p.m.

GENERAL

Thiagarajar College of Engineering: Alumni meet of 1975 batch; Karumuttu T. Kannan, correspondent, presides, 9.45 a.m.

Vivekananda College: Special NSS camp, Tiruvedakam West, 6 a.m.; Pon Perumal Temple, Vadipatti, 8 a.m.

Nadar Mahajana Sangam Sermathai Vasan College for Women: NSS camp, Koodakoil, 10 a.m.

SEV Matriculation Higher Secondary School: Silver jubilee Annual Day; S. Murugan, Inspector General of Police, South Zone, addresses, New Natham Road, 5.30 p.m.

Gandhi Museum: Spoken Hindi class, 11.30 a.m.

Bharathi Desiya Peravai: Seminar; PL. Karuppiah, M. Bismillah Khan and P. Varadharajan address; K. John Moses presides, Victoria Edward Hall, West Veli Street, 6 p.m.

Suham Trust: Free medical camp for women and adolescent girls, Suham Hospital, 1 Venkatachalapathy Street, Jayaraj Nagar, 12 noon.

Vaa Nanbaa: Cleaning service opposite the office of City Police Commissioner, Alagarkoil Road, 7 a.m.

Apollo Speciality Hospitals and Inner Wheel Club of Madurai: Free medical camp for women, Fortune Pandiyan Hotel, 9 a.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting; UC Higher Secondary School, 11 a.m.; RC School, Sivaganga Road, Melur, 6.30 p.m.; Justice V. R. Krishna Iyer Community Hall, Lake View Road, K. K. Nagar, and Railway Institute, 7 p.m.
title: madurai today
